name: On Progress Projects
query:
SELECT
    project.project_title AS "Project Title:Data:280",
    project.category AS "Category:Select:120",
    project.status AS "Status:Select:100",
    project.project_lead AS "Project Lead:Link/User:220",
    project.lead_name AS "Lead Name:Data:200",
    project.kickoff_date AS "Kickoff Date:Date:120",
    project.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:120",
    project.progress_rate AS "Project Progress:Percent:120",
    project.client AS "Client:Link/Customer:150"
FROM
    `tabProject` AS project
WHERE
    project.status = 'Progress'
ORDER BY
    project.project_title ASC
